game.name: Defense Collapse
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Defense Collapse is a strategy game set in a medieval fantasy world. Pioneer the unexplored dark forest, build your town and defenses, and hold out against the massive hordes of enemies. How long can you survive?
